# The NASA polynomials from https://www.grc.nasa.gov/WWW/CEAWeb/TP-2002-211556.pdf
# The first and second row are for 200 < T < 1000 and the third and forth row are for 1000 < T < 6000 K
# The listed coefficeints are a1, a2, a3, a4, a5 
                              a6, a7,  0, a8, a9
# (Noted that a7 and a8 are separated by 0)
# The non-dimensional Gibbs free energy G/RT is given by by
# -1/2 * a1/T**2 + a2/T*(ln(T)+1) + a3*(1-lnT)  - a4/2*T - a5/6*T**2 - a6/12*T**3 - a7/20*T**4 + a8/T - a9
# The expression of enthalpy and entropy can be found in the appendix in Tsai et al.(2017)
